detail_desc: Calf-length, A-line skirt in a linen and viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication and a frill trim, and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with ears on the top and a ribbed hem.
Top in a softly draping viscose weave with smocked sections. Square neckline with narrow elastication over the shoulders, long trumpet sleeves and a small frill trim around the neckline and hem.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with motifs, a hood with a wrapover front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Bell-shaped skirt in a fine-knit viscose blend with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a kangaroo pocket.
Pyjama shorts in an airy, patterned viscose weave with elasticated smocking at the waist.
Jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with a square neckline front and back, long puff sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with buttons at the back of the neck, front pockets and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short dress in soft stretch jersey with shoulder pads and long sleeves.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short, V-neck dress in jersey with wide elastication at the back of the waist, a wide sewn-on tie belt at the front and short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Sports jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a mesh-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets and wide ribbing at the back of the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Double-layered hat in patterned jersey.
Gently flared, sleeveless top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with gathers at the top and narrow shoulder straps with tie details.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a high waist with pleats and elastication at the back. Side pockets and a sewn-in belt at the front with a covered metal buckle. Unlined.
Shirt in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton twill. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke front and back. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Jacket in jersey made from a polyester and cotton blend with a print motif on the chest. Mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring, zip down the front and long raglan sleeves with taped details and ribbed cuffs. Mesh-lined side pockets with a concealed zip. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Ankle-length chinos in a soft cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake back pockets with a button. Tapered legs with creases.
Short cardigan knitted in a wool and alpaca blend for a soft, fluffy finish. V-neck, buttons down the front and long, voluminous sleeves that taper at the cuffs.
Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, long balloon sleeves and wide cuffs with a tie fastening. Seam at the waist and wide, asymmetric skirt.
Long-sleeved top in light sweatshirt fabric with a rounded lace collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sturdy, fine-knit jumper with wide sleeves and narrow ribbing at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with an open neckline with a small stand-up collar attached at the back.
Microfibre and lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.

Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets, a back pocket and slightly lower crotch. Tapered legs with grosgrain stripes down the sides, sewn-in creases down the front and a zip at the hems.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long top in jersey with a soft brushed finish. Double-layered polo neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and high slits in the sides.

Wide-fitting, calf-length dress in an airy weave with pleats at the top, and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, seam at the waist and a high slit at the front. Unlined.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams and a detachable, pile-lined hood with a peak. Zip down the front, elasticated cuffs and a fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Shorts in sturdy cotton denim with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt and zip fly and buttons. Front pockets, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Straight, wide-fitting dress in jersey crêpe with short sleeves and a rounded hem.

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a narrow, rounded collar and ties at the neck. Buttons down the front, a lace frill at the top that continues over the shoulders, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a scalloped lace trim.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Slingback ballet pumps in imitation suede with pointed toes and a scalloped edge. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and flared skirt.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.
Long earrings in metal and plastic. Length 12 cm.
Brushed metal stud earrings with decorative sparkly stones and glass and plastic beads. Size 2 cm.
Straight-cut faux fur jacket with wide notch lapels and a concealed press-stud fastening at the front. Lined.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Playsuit in a crinkled chiffon weave containing glittery threads. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the front, long sleeves with an opening and button at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs. Detachable, twisted tie belt with tassels. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Rib-knit socks in a soft organic cotton blend.
Fancy dress costume with a zip down the front, hood with appliqués and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft modal and cotton blend with a ribbed turtle neck and long sleeves.

Sleeveless top in a lightweight cotton weave with elastication across the back and narrow shoulder straps with a broderie anglaise flounce and overlocked scalloped edge. Decorative bow where the shoulder straps join at the back.

Jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Jersey-lined hood with a small collar and drawstring, a zip down the front, side pockets and a mesh inner pocket, all with a hook and loop fastening. Narrow trims at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Jersey lining.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and jacquard-patterned details. Seamless.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, concealed front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers. No buttons. Lined.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a yoke and short sleeves in stretch lace.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric. Lightly padded cups with removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Short skirt in woven fabric with sewn-in creases, a decorative tab and button at the top and a concealed zip and button at the back. Lined.
Fitted jumper in a ribbed viscose blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Top in cotton jersey with smocking at the top and narrow tie-top shoulder straps.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Dress in patterned sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a gently rounded hem and a detachable, braided imitation leather belt. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Shirt in fil à fil cotton with a button-down collar and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, wrapover top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip in the side. Gathered seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, and flared, draping skirt. Lined.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with a drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Satin-covered Alice band with shell-shaped appliqués and hair extensions.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.

Knee-length cargo shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap back pockets with concealed press-studs and patch leg pockets with a flap, concealed press-studs and pleats for extra space.
Cap-sleeved top in softly draping jersey with a double-layered stand-up collar that has gathers at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fabric trainers with lacing at the front and soft heels that can be folded down so they can be worn as slip-ons. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbed neckline.
Blouse in viscose crêpe jersey with a collar, buttons down the front, short cap sleeves and a gently rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Long, wide-fitting dress in crinkled jersey with a V-neck front and back and ties at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, short, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and a gathered seam creating a flounce at the hem for added width and volume. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft jacquard knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
